statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, income FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND income > 50000;
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_history FROM customer_profiles WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY first_name;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC, last_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND purchase_history->>'total_amount' > '1000';
SELECT AVG(income) AS avg_income, COUNT(customer_id) AS num_customers FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE total_purchases >= 5 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%York%' AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age < 25 OR age > 50
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location = 'New York' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, income, education_level FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN DemographicData ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = DemographicData.customer_id WHERE marital_status = 'Married';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_id, income, occupation FROM DemographicData WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM BehavioralData ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, education_level, occupation FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN DemographicData ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = DemographicData.customer_id WHERE education_level = 'Graduate';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN BehavioralData ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = BehavioralData.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM behaviors;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM behaviors GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email' AND campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM DemographicData WHERE income > 50000 AND education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT customer_id, website_visits FROM BehavioralData WHERE website_visits > 100 ORDER BY website_visits DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;

SELECT c.name, d.income, b.purchase_history FROM CustomerProfiles AS c INNER JOIN DemographicData AS d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id INNER JOIN BehavioralData AS b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'Bachelor' AND b.website_visits > 100;

SELECT m.campaign_name, m.start_date, m.end_date, c.name AS customer_name, c.email AS customer_email FROM MarketingCampaigns AS m INNER JOIN CustomerProfiles AS c ON JSON_CONTAINS(m.target_audience, JSON_ARRAY(c.gender)) WHERE m.budget > 5000;
